attributes.action: direct his attention to the rather more important matter of running the country, instead of wasting time commenting on inconsequential comments made by radio presenters. Also, please ban further mention of X-Factor evictions from the House, as we don't believe this to be an important political matter. Thanks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
